item.description:
Myles Standish State Forest is a beautiful forest on the south shore. It's located in Plymouth and Carver. They have plenty of trails and hundreds of acres of forest.

Kate has agreed to lead this hike. Please plan for a moderate to fast pace, and about 2 hours in the woods. Please bring plenty of snacks and water for you and your pet. Below is a link to a map of the forest.

Please meet at Gate 30, it is a good sized parking lot. Gate 30 is located on Upper College Pond Road, which is P2 on the map http://www.mass.gov/d...

*** This may be difficult to get to. Please plan accordingly.
item.how_to_find_us: Kate drives a Blue Jeep Cherokee
item.name: Myles Standish State Forest
